column1: What was the family name of the Russian rulers from the 17th century until the 1917 revolution?/Romanov/Razomov
Which U.S. president had a home called The Hermitage?/Andrew Jackson/George Bush
What two colors appear on the Polish flag?/Red and White/Orange and Blue
The ancient city of Rome was built on how many hills?/8/7
What is the modern name for Van Diemen's Land?/Tasmania/Queensland
